title: Calving Later Makes all the Difference

subtasks: ** Monitor cattle condition: The speaker notes that the system helps the cattle stay in better shape, so regularly checking on the animals is crucial.
** Reduce feed costs during winter: By not having to provide as much supplemental feed, the system lowers expenses.
** Maintain cattle health: The speaker mentions easier maintenance and healthier calves, hinting at regular care and monitoring.
** Promote grass growth and quality: The system allows for better management of cool-season grasses, contributing to better pasture health.
** Ensure timely grazing for calves: The goal is to have calves on green grass, which requires timing the calving season with the growth of pasture.
** Align management with natural cycles: The system works because it follows the natural timing of grass growth and animal needs.
